titleStmt.title: Anno Regni Caroli II Regis Angliæ, Scotiæ, Franciæ, & Hiberniæ, vicesimo secundo. At the Parliament begun at Westminster the eighth day of May, Anno Dom. 1661. in the thirteenth year of the reign of ... Lord Charles ... And there continued by several prorogations to the 14th day of February 1670 ...
Act to prevent and suppress seditious conventicles
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by ... John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery
